General.Name: Skyworth Digital Co Ltd
General.Description: Skyworth Digital Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells home video entertainment and intelligent connectivity solutions worldwide. The company provides set top boxes for broadcasting, android TV, and RDK platform; and broadband CPE for XGSPON&GPON, routers, and LTE and PLC products. It also offers smart home products, including battery powered, PTZ, and outdoor bullet camera; power plug and strip; filament bulb; and button. In addition, the company operates video operation support system, an online software platform that support operator to streamline and simplify their video operation; and STRATOS, an IoT solution that enables service operators to operate smart homes as a service. Further, it provides strategic business and technical consultancy, and end-to-end system integration, as well as project management, and hardware manufacturing services. Skyworth Digital Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. Skyworth Digital Co., Ltd.  operates as a subsidiary of Shenzhen Skyworth-RGB Electronics Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Unit A, Skyworth Mansion, Shenzhen, China, 518057
